pages.text: $(li)The Efficiency enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_pickaxe)$(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_pickaxe)Pickaxe$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_shovel)$(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_shovel)Shovel$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)$(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_hoe)$(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_hoe)Hoe$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)$(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l)$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)$(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l)$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)$(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)Flamarang$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the mining speed of the enchanted tool.
pages.title: Efficiency

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level V.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level VI of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_efficiency)Ancient Tome (Efficiency)$(/l).
